meanings.definition: A rich, dense cake made with a pound each of butter, sugar, flour, and eggs.
meanings.sent1: My grandma baked a delicious poundcake for my birthday.
meanings.sent2: I bought a slice of poundcake from the bakery for dessert.
meanings.sent3: The poundcake was so good, it disappeared in seconds at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as sweet as a freshly baked poundcake.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the poundcake filled the kitchen, making everyone hungry.

meanings.definition: To beat or strike repeatedly with great force.
meanings.sent1: The boxer had to poundcake the punching bag to train for the match.
meanings.sent2: I had to poundcake the dough to make it soft and pliable.
meanings.sent3: He tried to poundcake the stubborn jar lid open with no success.
meanings.sent4: The heavy rain seemed to poundcake the roof all night long.
meanings.sent5: The drummer began to poundcake the drums, creating a powerful rhythm.
